They can help workers unload cargo from the ships and load the heavy-duty trucks using cranes. The large cargo ship has compartments to store grain. The movable cranes can lift the grain off the ship and onto the conveyor belt. Equipped with a wireless radio, the chief officer runs the dock and takes care of everything. Why You'll Love It: The fisherman mini figure, with a rod for catching fish on the pier, gives kids a realistic seaside experience. Its a busy day down at the LEGO City Harbor as ships dock and unload their goods! Use the crane to unload the grain from the cargo ship, then drop it onto the conveyor belt and move it into the awaiting truck. The chief officer keeps his dock running smoothly as trucks and ships come and go full of cargo, while a fisherman is busy catching his dinner on the pier! 551 pieces. Products are new and in its original packing.Shipping on heart LEGO Spongebob Squarepants 3817 Flying Dutchman $ 24.99 S&H: $ 6.95 GO TO SHOP at EntertainmentEarth.com help Avast, Spongebob! Help SpongeBob and Patrick sink The Flying Dutchman! Set features Pirate SpongeBob, Pirate Patrick, and The Flying Dutchman minifigures. Includes a pirate ship, small island, treasure map, cutlasses, and more! Help SpongeBob and Patrick sink The Flying Dutchman! Captain SpongeBob and his first mate Patrick have found an old treasure map and are searching for the treasure. Barnacles! The Flying Dutchman is here on his ghostly ship. Help keep him at bay using the bubble blaster or hell make everyone walk the plank! This exciting set includes 3 LEGO minifigures - Pirate SpongeBob, Pirate Patrick, and The Flying Dutchman - plus a pirate ship and small island. The pirate ship features a plank, sail, and crows nest, while the island sports a boardwalk, treasure chest, and cannon. Accessories include a treasure map, 2 cutlasses, a shovel, and a bag of souls! The pirate ship measures over 7-inches long x 7-inches tall. The island measures 5-inches wide x 3-inches tall. Includes SpongeBob, Patrick, and all-new bus driver minifigure Top lifts off bus for added play inside 210 pieces Simply Vintage Brings You The best value on all Vintage and Non Vintage Toys&Collectibles and Lego Sets. All of our Lego's and toys are original and Most have a best offers available. heart LEGO SpongeBob SquarePants Bikini Bottom Express $ 124.97 S&H: $ 4.99 GO TO SHOP at Amazon Marketplace help All aboard for new adventures with SpongeBob SquarePants, Patrick, and the Bikini Bottom Express. The bus keeps leaving without SpongeBob and Patrick! Can they get their tickets from the machine before it speeds away again? Lift the roof off the bus to seat SpongeBob and Patrick inside. A propeller on the back of the bus really spins. Includes SpongeBob, Patrick and all-new bus driver minifigure, plus a ticket booth and bus stop. Bus measures 6"long. 210 pieces. heart LEGO SpongeBob The Krusty Krab $ 159.95 S&H: $ 5.49 GO TO SHOP at Amazon Marketplace help Join SpongeBob, Squidward, Mr. Krabs and Plankton in a Krabby Patty adventure at the Krusty Krab restaurant. Push down on the lever to flip the Krabby Patties and let SpongeBob know there's an order up. When it's time for closing, help SpongeBob clean up by tossing the trash in the dumpster. Then, place the money in the safe and be sure to hide the Krabby Patty secret formula so Plankton doesn't find it. It's just another day at Bikini Bottom's premier fast food restaurant. Good ol'Mr. Krabs is just hoping the boys don't cause any damage! To be able to understand why LEGO has been successful for so long, just look to the name. LEGO originally got its name from founder Ole Kirk Christiansen by combining the Danish words"Leg Got"that means"play well"and later realized that the word LEGO in Latin translates to"I put together."The LEGO set became a standard of creative play for children around the world, unlocking the creativity to build vehicles, buildings, cities and more. Most historians point to the invention of the wheel as a major turning point in world history. The invention of the LEGO wheel had the same monumental effect in the history of LEGO, making it possible to create cars, trucks and eventually the LEGO train building set that is one of the most successful LEGO sets of all time.
